comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I just went to the _Don't Let Greg Down_ website and donated some cash. A little tough this month because we're so cash-strapped, what with the holidays and all. But when I saw that picture of him sitting all alone on his bike and those Emmett Kelly eyes and Sally Struthers in the background all verklempt and going on about "rusty moral underpinnings" and whatnot, I just crumbled. I'll be there at 12:15 and I'll be bringing some extra clothing, toothbrushes, books, and medical supplies as well. So, so sad... DU

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Afraid I let you guys down today. I was in one loooong meeting from 9 am to 1 pm. But I'm looking forward to the care package from Dave.
